comment.author: 8777250@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage PSA (Pacific Southwest Airlines) 1949-1988, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 12548624@N03
comment._content: Great shot of a rarely-seen cabin. By the time I rode one of these, they had done it up in the splashy orange design.
